title: net/textproto: DotReader can't determine end of data after empty line
body:
DotReader handles lines only ends with CRLF in document, but source code seems to handle ends with only LF too and I expected that behavior.  

This issue is one that DotReader can't determine end of data after empty line ends with LF not CRLF.  I confirmed that this issue still exists in current master ( 08ca401444cd3e08a98d7fd3f57e44b95243b4fb ).

I am ready to send the patch to fix this issue.
